name: Reacji Channeler
description: Move post to other channel by attaching reactions

settings.help_text: When true, sharing will be performed every time reaction is added. When false, once a share is performed, the same post will not be shared until the number of days specified in **Days to keep shared record** has passed.
When **Allow duplicate sharing** is false, plugin will keep the record that post was shared for the period of time set here.
